SQLStatement.statement: CREATE TABLE LCO_ISIC ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CREATED DATE NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR2(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISDEFAULT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', ISSUMMARY CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', LCO_ISIC_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, NAME NVARCHAR2(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED DATE NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, VALUE NVARCHAR2(40), CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isdefault IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (issummary IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_ISIC_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_ISIC_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CREATED DATE NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR2(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISDEFAULT CHAR(1), LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, NAME NVARCHAR2(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED DATE NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isdefault IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CREATED DATE NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR2(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISDEFAULT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, NAME NVARCHAR2(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED DATE NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isdefault IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CREATED DATE NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR2(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, NAME NVARCHAR2(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED DATE NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, ISSOTRX CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N' NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (IsSOTrx IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, BASETYPE NVARCHAR2(1) NOT NULL, C_TAX_ID NUMBER(10), CREATED DATE NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR2(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISCALCONINVOICE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y', ISCALCONPAYMENT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', ISMODIFIABLEONPAYMENT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, NAME NVARCHAR2(60) NOT NULL, THRESHOLDMIN NUMBER, UPDATED DATE NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMBER(10), C_BASETAX_ID NUMBER(10), CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (iscalconinvoice IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (iscalconpayment IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (ismodifiableonpayment IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGTYPE_WITHHOLDINGC FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID), CONSTRAINT BASETAX_WITHHOLDINGCALC FOREIGN KEY (C_BASETAX_ID) REFERENCES C_TAX (C_TAX_ID), CONSTRAINT TAX_WITHHOLDINGCALC FOREIGN KEY (C_TAX_ID) REFERENCES C_TAX (C_TAX_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULECONF ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CREATED DATE NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISUSEBPISIC CHAR(1), ISUSEBPTAXPAYERTYPE CHAR(1), ISUSEORGISIC CHAR(1), ISUSEORGTAXPAYERTYPE CHAR(1), ISUSEWITHHOLDINGCATEGORY CHAR(1), LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, UPDATED DATE NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isusebpisic IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isusebptaxpayertype IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isuseorgisic IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isuseorgtaxpayertype IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isusewithholdingcategory IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULECONF_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGTYPE_WITHHOLDINGRCO FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CREATED DATE NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR2(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISDEFAULT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', LCO_BP_ISIC_ID NUMBER(10), LCO_BP_TAXPAYERTYPE_ID NUMBER(10), LCO_ORG_ISIC_ID NUMBER(10), LCO_ORG_TAXPAYERTYPE_ID NUMBER(10), LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID NUMBER(10), LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID NUMBER(10), LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMBER(10), NAME NVARCHAR2(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED DATE NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, VALIDFROM DATE, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isdefault IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGCALC_WITHHOLDINGRUL FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_WITHHOLDIN FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGTYPE_WITHHOLDINGRUL FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_INVOICEWITHHOLDING ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, C_INVOICE_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CREATED DATE NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, DATEACCT DATE, DATETRX DATE, ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISCALCONPAYMENT CHAR(1), ISTAXINCLUDED CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N' NOT NULL, LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID NUMBER(10), LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMBER(10), PERCENT NUMBER, PROCESSED CHAR(1) NOT NULL, TAXAMT NUMBER NOT NULL, TAXBASEAMT NUMBER NOT NULL, UPDATED DATE NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, C_TAX_ID NUMBER(10), LCO_INVOICEWITHHOLDING_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (iscalconpayment IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (istaxincluded IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (processed IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_INVOICEWITHHOLDING_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_INVOICEWITHHOLDING_ID), CONSTRAINT INVOICE_INVOICEWITHHOLDING FOREIGN KEY (C_INVOICE_ID) REFERENCES C_INVOICE (C_INVOICE_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGRULE_INVOICEWITHHOL FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGTYPE_INVOICEWITHHOL FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID), CONSTRAINT TAX_INVOICEWITHHOLDING FOREIGN KEY (C_TAX_ID) REFERENCES C_TAX (C_TAX_ID) )

ALTER TABLE C_BPARTNER ADD lco_taxpayertype_id NUMBER(10) ADD lco_isic_id NUMBER(10) ADD (CONSTRAINT taxpayertype_bpartner FOREIGN KEY (lco_taxpayertype_id) REFERENCES LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE) ADD (CONSTRAINT isic_bpartner FOREIGN KEY (lco_isic_id) REFERENCES LCO_ISIC)

ALTER TABLE AD_ORGINFO ADD lco_taxpayertype_id NUMBER(10) ADD lco_isic_id NUMBER(10) ADD (CONSTRAINT taxpayertype_orginfo FOREIGN KEY (lco_taxpayertype_id) REFERENCES LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE) ADD (CONSTRAINT isic_orginfo FOREIGN KEY (lco_isic_id) REFERENCES LCO_ISIC)
ALTER TABLE C_CHARGE ADD lco_withholdingcategory_id NUMBER(10) ADD (CONSTRAINT withholdingcategory_charge FOREIGN KEY (lco_withholdingcategory_id) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY)
ALTER TABLE M_PRODUCT ADD lco_withholdingcategory_id NUMBER(10) ADD (CONSTRAINT withholdingcategory_product FOREIGN KEY (lco_withholdingcategory_id) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY)
ALTER TABLE C_TAXCATEGORY ADD iswithholding CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N' CHECK (iswithholding IN ('Y','N'))
ALTER TABLE C_INVOICE ADD generatewithholding CHAR(1) ADD withholdingamt NUMBER

CREATE TABLE LCO_ISIC ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CREATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISDEFAULT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', ISSUMMARY CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', LCO_ISIC_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, VALUE VARCHAR(40), CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isdefault IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (issummary IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_ISIC_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_ISIC_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CREATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISDEFAULT CHAR(1), LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isdefault IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CREATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISDEFAULT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isdefault IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CREATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, ISSOTRX CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N' NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (IsSOTrx IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, BASETYPE VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, C_TAX_ID NUMERIC(10,0), CREATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISCALCONINVOICE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y', ISCALCONPAYMENT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', ISMODIFIABLEONPAYMENT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL, THRESHOLDMIN NUMERIC, UPDATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMERIC(10,0), C_BASETAX_ID NUMERIC(10,0), CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (iscalconinvoice IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (iscalconpayment IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (ismodifiableonpayment IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGTYPE_WITHHOLDINGC FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID), CONSTRAINT BASETAX_WITHHOLDINGCALC FOREIGN KEY (C_BASETAX_ID) REFERENCES C_TAX (C_TAX_ID), CONSTRAINT TAX_WITHHOLDINGCALC FOREIGN KEY (C_TAX_ID) REFERENCES C_TAX (C_TAX_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULECONF ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CREATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISUSEBPISIC CHAR(1), ISUSEBPTAXPAYERTYPE CHAR(1), ISUSEORGISIC CHAR(1), ISUSEORGTAXPAYERTYPE CHAR(1), ISUSEWITHHOLDINGCATEGORY CHAR(1), LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, UPDATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isusebpisic IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isusebptaxpayertype IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isuseorgisic IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isuseorgtaxpayertype IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isusewithholdingcategory IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULECONF_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGTYPE_WITHHOLDINGRCO FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CREATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(255), ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISDEFAULT CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', LCO_BP_ISIC_ID NUMERIC(10,0), LCO_BP_TAXPAYERTYPE_ID NUMERIC(10,0), LCO_ORG_ISIC_ID NUMERIC(10,0), LCO_ORG_TAXPAYERTYPE_ID NUMERIC(10,0), LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID NUMERIC(10,0), LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID NUMERIC(10,0), LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMERIC(10,0), NAME VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL, UPDATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, VALIDFROM TIMESTAMP, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (isdefault IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGCALC_WITHHOLDINGRUL FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCALC_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_WITHHOLDIN FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGTYPE_WITHHOLDINGRUL FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) )

CREATE TABLE LCO_INVOICEWITHHOLDING ( AD_CLIENT_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, AD_ORG_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, C_INVOICE_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CREATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, DATEACCT TIMESTAMP, DATETRX TIMESTAMP, ISACTIVE CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NOT NULL, ISCALCONPAYMENT CHAR(1), ISTAXINCLUDED CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N' NOT NULL, LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID NUMERIC(10,0), LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID NUMERIC(10,0), PERCENT NUMERIC, PROCESSED CHAR(1) NOT NULL, TAXAMT NUMERIC NOT NULL, TAXBASEAMT NUMERIC NOT NULL, UPDATED TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, UPDATEDBY NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, C_TAX_ID NUMERIC(10,0), LCO_INVOICEWITHHOLDING_ID NUMERIC(10,0) NOT NULL, CHECK (isactive IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (iscalconpayment IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (istaxincluded IN ('Y','N')), CHECK (processed IN ('Y','N')), CONSTRAINT LCO_INVOICEWITHHOLDING_KEY PRIMARY KEY (LCO_INVOICEWITHHOLDING_ID), CONSTRAINT INVOICE_INVOICEWITHHOLDING FOREIGN KEY (C_INVOICE_ID) REFERENCES C_INVOICE (C_INVOICE_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGRULE_INVOICEWITHHOL FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGRULE_ID), CONSTRAINT WITHHOLDINGTYPE_INVOICEWITHHOL FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE (LCO_WITHHOLDINGTYPE_ID), CONSTRAINT TAX_INVOICEWITHHOLDING FOREIGN KEY (C_TAX_ID) REFERENCES C_TAX (C_TAX_ID) )

ALTER TABLE C_BPARTNER ADD COLUMN lco_taxpayertype_id NUMERIC(10,0), ADD COLUMN lco_isic_id NUMERIC(10,0), ADD CONSTRAINT taxpayertype_bpartner FOREIGN KEY (lco_taxpayertype_id) REFERENCES LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE, ADD CONSTRAINT isic_bpartner FOREIGN KEY (lco_isic_id) REFERENCES LCO_ISIC

ALTER TABLE AD_ORGINFO ADD COLUMN lco_taxpayertype_id NUMERIC(10,0), ADD COLUMN lco_isic_id NUMERIC(10,0), ADD CONSTRAINT taxpayertype_orginfo FOREIGN KEY (lco_taxpayertype_id) REFERENCES LCO_TAXPAYERTYPE, ADD CONSTRAINT isic_orginfo FOREIGN KEY (lco_isic_id) REFERENCES LCO_ISIC
ALTER TABLE C_CHARGE ADD COLUMN lco_withholdingcategory_id NUMERIC(10,0), ADD CONSTRAINT withholdingcategory_charge FOREIGN KEY (lco_withholdingcategory_id) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY
ALTER TABLE M_PRODUCT ADD COLUMN lco_withholdingcategory_id NUMERIC(10,0), ADD CONSTRAINT withholdingcategory_product FOREIGN KEY (lco_withholdingcategory_id) REFERENCES LCO_WITHHOLDINGCATEGORY
ALTER TABLE C_TAXCATEGORY ADD COLUMN iswithholding CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N' CHECK (iswithholding IN ('Y','N'))
ALTER TABLE C_INVOICE ADD COLUMN generatewithholding CHAR(1), ADD COLUMN withholdingamt NUMERIC

dynvalrule.Name: LCO_Not Withholding Taxes
dynvalrule.Code: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_TaxCategory WHERE C_TaxCategory.C_TaxCategory_ID=C_Tax.C_TaxCategory_ID AND IsWithholding='Y')

dynvalrule.Name: LCO_Withholding Taxes
dynvalrule.Code: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_TaxCategory WHERE C_TaxCategory.C_TaxCategory_ID=C_Tax.C_TaxCategory_ID AND IsWithholding='Y')

dynvalrule.Name: LCO_Taxes From Withholding Type
dynvalrule.Code: C_Tax.C_Tax_ID IN (SELECT C_Tax_ID FROM LCO_WithholdingCalc WHERE LCO_WithholdingType_ID = @LCO_WithholdingType_ID@)

column.Description: The record is active in the system
column.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
column.Name: Active

column.Help: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

field.Name: Search Key
field.Description: Search key for the record in the format required - must be unique
field.Help: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

SQLStatement.statement: UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retencin' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Cash Journal' and t.name='Withholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retencin' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Invoice (Customer)' and t.name='Withholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retencin' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Invoice (Vendor)' and t.name='Withholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='CIIU' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='ISIC' and t.name='ISIC') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retencin' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Payment' and t.name='Withholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Contribuyente' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Tax Payer Type' and t.name='Tax Payer Type') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Categora Retencin' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Withholding Category' and t.name='Withholding Category') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Clculo Retencin' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Withholding Type' and t.name='Withholding Calc') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Regla Retencin' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Withholding Type' and t.name='Withholding Rule') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Client SET ModelValidationClasses = CASE WHEN ModelValidationClasses LIKE '%org.adempiere.model.LCO_Validator%' THEN ModelValidationClasses WHEN LENGTH (TRIM (ModelValidationClasses)) = 0 OR ModelValidationClasses IS NULL THEN TO_NCHAR ('org.adempiere.model.LCO_Validator') ELSE ModelValidationClasses || ';org.adempiere.model.LCO_Validator' END WHERE AD_Client_ID != 0

UPDATE AD_Client SET ModelValidationClasses = CASE WHEN ModelValidationClasses LIKE '%org.adempiere.model.LCO_Validator%' THEN ModelValidationClasses WHEN LENGTH (TRIM (ModelValidationClasses)) = 0 OR ModelValidationClasses IS NULL THEN 'org.adempiere.model.LCO_Validator' ELSE ModelValidationClasses || ';org.adempiere.model.LCO_Validator' END WHERE AD_Client_ID != 0

UPDATE AD_Column SET Callout = CASE WHEN Callout LIKE '%org.adempiere.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff%' THEN Callout WHEN LENGTH (TRIM (Callout)) = 0 OR Callout IS NULL THEN TO_NCHAR('org.compiere.model.CalloutPayment.invoice;org.adempiere.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff;org.compiere.model.CalloutPayment.amounts') ELSE Callout || ';org.adempiere.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff;org.compiere.model.CalloutPayment.amounts' END WHERE AD_Column_ID = 5355 /* Payment Invoice */
